remarks: The map in ~ cff1 can be assumed to be a strictly monotone ordinal function without loss of generality.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Feb-2013.)
statement:
cfsmo $p |- ( A e. On -> E. f ( f : ( cf ` A ) --> A /\ Smo f /\ A. z e. A E. w e. ( cf ` A ) z C_ ( f ` w ) ) ) $.
$d A f w z $.
